reviews.review: Only thing great about this game it has a built in bots that join your game when you create one .

OH BOY! This review is gonna be split into 2 parts. The first about the main game and the second about the deleted scenes.

Counter-Strike: Condition Zero, at its surface is just Counter-Strike. But after that the game is actually Counter-Strike, but with more stuff. You get a short campaign that is literally just starting an offline match with bots. The only positive thing about the campaign is that I like the AI and how you set up the crew. I know I don't have much playtime and that's because I didn't bother finishing the "Campaign". And it's just Counter-Strike with the multiplayer.

Counter-Strike: Condition Zero Deleted Scenes is Condition Zero's older and cooler brother. It has an actual interesting series of missions. While it lacks multiplayer, whether that be because it focuses on the campaign or because its incomplete. I would honestly recommend this game just for deleted scenes.

This game consists of textures for GMod, a campaign, a "campaign", multiplayer.
the single player is surprisingly fun to complete

An underrated Counter Strike game and it shouldn't be like that. First of all it is the only CS game that has a campaign.
Secondly, the campaign and the missions are very good and very surprising.
I think every CS fan(and every gamer in special) should play this CS, for at least once.

From me, 10/10.
I hope this helped you, thank you and take care.
Some good fun to be had for CS oldtimers.

CS1.6的画质升级版，经典不必多言。

Składniki:
1 kg kapusty świeżej - pół średniej główki
2 kg kapusty kiszonej + 2,5 szklanki wody do gotowania
80 g suszonych grzybów + 500 ml wody do moczenia
500 g łopatki wieprzowej
300 g łopatki wołowej
500 g boczku surowego bez skóry
500 g schabu wieprzowego od karku
50 g smalcu wieprzowego
180 g kiełbasy myśliwskiej podwędzanej
150 g boczku surowego wędzonego
150 g boczku parzonego wędzonego
2 duże cebule - do 400 g
50 g suszonych śliwek bez pestek - lub więcej
1 szklanka czerwonego, wytrawnego wina - można pominąć
przyprawy i zioła: 5 ziaren ziela angielskiego, łyżeczka czarnego pieprzu, 5 liści laurowych, 1 goździk, 2 ziarna jałowca
Bigos
Улучшенная в плане графона кс 1.6 плюс некоторые плюшки больше нечего сказать.

1,5 kg kapusty kiszonej
1,5 kg białej kapusty
1,5 kg wieprzowiny (500 g łopatki, 1000 g karczku)
300 g wołowiny (np. rostbef)
300 g wędzonego boczku
400 g kiełbasy (200 g podwawelskiej, 200 g jałowcowej)
2 małe cebule
150 g suszonych śliwek bez pestek
20 g suszonych grzybów
1 łyżka koncentratu pomidorowego
500 ml czerwonego wytrawnego wina
olej do obsmażenia mięsa
przyprawy – 4 liście laurowe, 4 ziarna ziela angielskiego, 10 ziaren pieprzu, 6 ziaren jałowca, 1/2 łyżeczki gorczycy, 1 łyżeczka cukru, sól i świeżo mielony ♥♥♥♥♥♥ do smaku
1/2 łyżeczki słodkiej papryki w proszku i szczypta chili w proszku (opcjonalnie)

Kapustę wkładamy do dużego garnka z grubym dnem, wkładamy do niej kości, żeberka, oraz liście i ziele. Zalewamy wszystko wodą, gotujemy na średnim ogniu około godzinki. W międzyczasie szklimy na oleju cebulę pokrojoną w kostkę, wraz z boczkiem i kiełbasami ( również w kostkę ) i pieczarkami pokrojonymi w plasterki.

u can treat CSCZ as the cs 1.6 with the bots, and u can have a warm up here, just choose the difficulty and start the games, 18 maps here, and ofc u need to complete some challenges required for passing the levels. That sounds really ez but actually no, i've only passed the normal mission cuz from the Hard mission it's gonna be some real hard shxt, so if u just wanna take the challenges, start from the hard one.
BUT one shxtty point that the bots always repeat their words, ja not "sometimes" but "always", and never stop, unless u activated a new phrase and it may start to repeat again... i could still handle it but maybe not for others...

作为90后老人，第一次玩CS时是初一，这款游戏是我的FPS游戏启蒙之作，当初玩的是路边5元买的盗版光盘，所谓的1.5跟1.6，补票一下。打开游戏看了下界面还是熟悉的味道，不过贴图和模型高清化了，保留了老版地图，同时新版地图cz版本有点csgo的味道，很不错，玩了几把连跟中等难度人机对枪的资格都没有了，想起了以前放学后趁爸妈没回来追着最高难度敌人打的日子。win10玩起来会经常闪退还有语音卡住，不过反正也不是买来玩的，现在游戏画质越来越好，这种上古游戏的确有点玩不下去了。啥也不说了，爷青回！

Если у вас мало времени на то чтоб пройти игру, то это самое то. 
Но в мультиплеер играл мало, но ощущение такие же что и в 1.6
A good game but cs:cz deleted scenes is better
困难和专家才是真正考验技术的。

The weird bastard child of Counter-Strike. It went through a bunch of versions leading to it being released just before Counter-Strike Source, meaning it was immediately obsolete. It didn't offer much reason to buy it over 1.6 at the time either, with most of the new features being backported into that game as well.

The main reason to buy this nowadays is to check out Condition Zero Deleted Scenes, which is an incredibly odd single player campaign that can feel like a slog at times but has some really cool ideas. The icebreaker level and final level are especially cool.

Maybe don't buy this at full price (even if it is already cheap), since the main game itself isn't really worth it. If you do buy this, it should be purely as a curiousity for Deleted Scenes.
I would love to give a Legendary Status to this game.

This was the First Valve game I ever played. While still a bit primitive compared to Today's games, Counter-strike: CZ is still really fun to play.  

I was surprised that there was still an active community for this, although I didn't join any servers, and stuck mainly to Single player. The AI in the single player isn't the best, but they get the job done, and when push comes to shove, they can somewhat hold their own. Its cool that each one has a minor personality, being named, having a weapon of choice, and some stats to them. sure, they're idiots, but they're LOVABLE idiots. x3

The Single player consists of many different maps, with different objectives besides shooting the bad dudes, defusing the bomb, and rescuing people. For example, one map might require you to kill 5 people, and make sure one of those kills is with a shotgun. Another may ask you to kill a person, and win the round within a minute. all the while, you have to be winning more rounds than the bad dudes.

Overall, its not the polished game that is Global Offensive, but it hits the right notes, and is pretty fun, even if playing with the bots.
